sentence: However, candidates Doug Mastriano and Dave White vowed to make no such exceptions.

title: Leading GOP candidate for Pennsylvania governor opposes health exceptions for abortion

sentence: Others, such as Pennsylvania's Republican gubernatorial nominee Doug Mastriano, received Trump's endorsement right before the election, once they had already emerged as frontrunners.
